item.title: [scd] Hanged Executioner
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

When Hanged Executioner enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

{3}{W}, Exile Hanged Executioner: Exile target creature.

item.title: [scd] Guttersnipe
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Shaman

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.

item.title: [scd] Grimoire of the Dead
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

{1}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a study counter on Grimoire of the Dead.

{T}, Remove three study counters from Grimoire of the Dead and sacrifice it: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. They're black Zombies in addition to their other colors and types.

item.title: [scd] Great Oak Guardian
item.description:
Creature — Treefolk

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Reach

When Great Oak Guardian enters the battlefield, creatures target player controls get +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap them.

item.title: [scd] Graypelt Refuge
item.description:
Land

Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.

When Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

item.title: [scd] Gray Merchant of Asphodel
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Gray Merchant of Asphodel enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

item.title: [scd] Gravitational Shift
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures with flying get +2/+0.

Creatures without flying get -2/-0.

item.title: [scd] Gravespawn Sovereign
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Tap five untapped Zombies you control: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [scd] Gleaming Overseer
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Wizard

When Gleaming Overseer enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Zombie tokens you control have hexproof and menace.

item.title: [scd] Gideon Jura
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Gideon

+2: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able.

−2: Destroy target tapped creature.

0: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

item.title: [scd] Geralf's Mindcrusher
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

When Geralf's Mindcrusher enters the battlefield, target player mills five cards.

Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

item.title: [scd] Geode Rager
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

First strike

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, goad each creature target player controls. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

item.title: [scd] Generous Gift
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

item.title: [scd] Garruk's Uprising
item.description:
Enchantment

When Garruk's Uprising enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.

Creatures you control have trample. (They can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker they're attacking.)

Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

item.title: [scd] Game Trail
item.description:
Land

As Game Trail enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Game Trail enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

item.title: [scd] Furnace Whelp
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Frontier Siege
item.description:
Enchantment

As Frontier Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.

• Khans — At the beginning of each of your main phases, add {G}{G}.

• Dragons — Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

item.title: [scd] Fortified Village
item.description:
Land

As Fortified Village enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Forest or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, Fortified Village enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

item.title: [scd] Forest
item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.title: [scd] Forest
item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.title: [scd] Forest
item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.title: [scd] Forest
item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.title: [scd] Foreboding Ruins
item.description:
Land

As Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Swamp or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

item.title: [scd] Foe-Razer Regent
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Foe-Razer Regent enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

Whenever a creature you control fights, put two +1/+1 counters on it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [scd] Fleshbag Marauder
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Warrior

When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [scd] Flameblast Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever Flameblast Dragon attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, Flameblast Dragon deals X damage to any target.

item.title: [scd] Fires of Yavimaya
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures you control have haste.

Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Fiery Confluence
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.

• Fiery Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature.

• Fiery Confluence deals 2 damage to each opponent.

• Destroy target artifact.

item.title: [scd] Felidar Retreat
item.description:
Enchantment

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —

• Create a 2/2 white Cat Beast creature token.

• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Feed the Swarm
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.

item.title: [scd] Favorable Winds
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

item.title: [scd] Farhaven Elf
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

When Farhaven Elf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [scd] Faerie Formation
item.description:
Creature — Faerie

Flying

{3}{U}: Create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying. Draw a card.

item.title: [scd] Explosion of Riches
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw a card, then each other player may draw a card. Whenever a card is drawn this way, Explosion of Riches deals 5 damage to target opponent chosen at random from among your opponents.

item.title: [scd] Ever-Watching Threshold
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever an opponent attacks, if they attacked you and/or a planeswalker you control, draw a card.

item.title: [scd] Eternal Witness
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [scd] Eternal Skylord
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Wizard

When Eternal Skylord enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Zombie tokens you control have flying.

item.title: [scd] Enter the God-Eternals
item.description:
Sorcery

Enter the God-Eternals deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain life equal to the damage dealt this way. Target player mills four cards. Amass 4. (Put four +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

item.title: [scd] Empyrean Eagle
item.description:
Creature — Bird Spirit

Flying

Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

item.title: [scd] Emeria Angel
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

item.title: [scd] Elfhame Palace
item.description:
Land

Elfhame Palace enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

item.title: [scd] Elemental Bond
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

item.title: [scd] Drumhunter
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid Warrior

At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, you may draw a card.

{T}: Add {C}.

item.title: [scd] Dredge the Mire
item.description:
Sorcery

Each opponent chooses a creature card in their graveyard. Put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [scd] Dream Pillager
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever Dream Pillager deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.

item.title: [scd] Drakuseth, Maw of Flames
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever Drakuseth, Maw of Flames attacks, it deals 4 damage to any target and 3 damage to each of up to two other targets.

item.title: [scd] Dragon Tempest
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn.

Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.

item.title: [scd] Dragonspeaker Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Human Barbarian Shaman

Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

item.title: [scd] Dragon's Hoard
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard.

{T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [scd] Dragonmaster Outcast
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
